name: CryptoCurrencies
0:
”Alexa, open crypto currencies”
”what's the litecoin value?”
”Alexa, open crypto currencies and add litecoin to favorites”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crypto currencies
des: Check the value of the crypto currencies, add currencies to your's favorites list and check the market value. Values updated directly from worldcoinindex.com API. Supported changes : usd, eur, btc, aud, cad, gbp and inr.
